context: A Suspicious sequence of exploration activities was identified on July 4, 2024, indicating potential asset identification and lateral movement by an attacker. Several processes were executed including `whoami.exe` and `powershell.exe`. The commands were executed by the user with SID `S-1-5-21-561436748-3867387497-1732241745-3701` from the host `mb-winclient`, which has the AadDeviceId `7661dfd4-218f-4016-8a87-66d68a7f098e`.
question: Who performed the unusual addition of credentials to the OAuth app SimulandApp?
solution_steps: Suspicious sequence of exploration activities was detected, initiated by a user with AadUserId `2de70991-2799-4a95-b734-8e3df3a50118`.
Luciano Herrera (pwilson@niseko.alpineskihouse.co) performed an unusual addition of credentials, specifically a password, to the application SimulandApp.
